name: We are WATCHING!!
description:
This game is social experiment about uncovering the whole TRUTH. Is our society corrupt??? Are Illuminati control EVERYTHING or it were Reptilians all along? Could find the TRIANGLE?!?

EPILEPSY WARNING!!

Share it before gets deleted!!!

by team Bio Knedlíky

Matúš Kokoška, Šimon Borš, Jakub Kokoška and Tomáš Zlatovský

This game is entry of Bratislava Game Jam 2020: Czechoslovak Edition
